EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal Partner Days_2017.Austin SI Replatforming Waitlist
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Partner Days - Austin - Feb. 23rd, 2017 | Waitlist Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Pivotal Partner Days in Austin, TX waitlist.
We will contact you if an opening becomes available.
If you have any questions please contact Cameron Stewart (cstewart@pivotal.io <[[mailto:cstewart@pivotal.io]]>) or Andrew Mackenzie (amackenzie@pivotal.io <[[mailto:amackenzie@pivotal.io]]>).
- Pivotal Partner Alliances Team
